page.title: 09WARDLE VILLAGE
page.content: I liked Wardle Village because it was quiet and you could go on walks wherever you wanted to go. There is a reservoir that is called Watergrove to the north of the village.It is still nice but not lovely and quiet as it used to be.The sides of the cobbled Ramsden Rd.going up to the reservoir are now very mucky because the road is now used by many windsurfers and sailors in their cars.They have recently been given permission to use the reservoir for recreation.Fences have been put up recently to stop the sheep eating the newly planted trees.Before this people and sheep wandered freely on the moors.I hope the sailors and wind surfers won't stay.We don't want them to pollute the water.Despite all this we still like living in Wardle Village.
